patthana14.4:1.1_0: Hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.4:1.1_1: Hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati
patthana14.4:1.1_2: hetupaccayā. Hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca naahetuko
patthana14.4:1.1_3: ceva nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana14.4:2.1_0: Sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati
patthana14.4:2.1_1: hetupaccayā. Sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo
patthana14.4:2.1_2: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko
patthana14.4:2.1_3: ca naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana14.4:3.1_0: Hetuñceva sahetukañca sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko
patthana14.4:3.1_1: ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuñceva sahetukañca sahetukañceva na ca hetuñca
patthana14.4:3.1_2: dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuñceva
patthana14.4:3.1_3: sahetukañca sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca naahetuko
patthana14.4:3.1_4: ceva nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana14.4:4.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava. (Sahajātavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṁ.)
